channel.title: Rhona Mitra on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rhona Mitra on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Red Sonja’ Review: The Bikini-Clad Warrior Is Back in a New Version That’s a Deadly Blend of Cheesy and Dull
item.description: Matilda Lutz plays the titular heroine in MJ Bassett’s long-aborning take on the 1985 film starring Brigitte Nielsen and Arnold Schwarzenegger.
